abstract: White House state dinner honoring Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau and his family goes smoothly, contrasting with two controversial visits made by his father, former Canadian Prime Min Pierre Trudeau, in 1969 and 1977.
lead_paragraph: The state dinner for Canada’s prime minister included celebrity guests born in his country, such as Ryan Reynolds, Sandra Oh, Michael J. Fox and Mike Myers.

headline.main: Justin Trudeau’s White House Dinner Has the Air of a Family Reunion
headline.print_headline: A State Dinner at the White House Has the Air of a Family Reunion

snippet: The state dinner for Canada’s prime minister included celebrity guests born in his country, such as Ryan Reynolds, Sandra Oh, Michael J. Fox and Mike Myers.
